channel.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
channel.description:
Well I thought I'd try and upgrade to a 637 ( been working on a 317 ) so I downloaded a 637 (torvapkz) just to see how I'd like it.. and for starters, when I try and load the client it gets stuck on "Checking for updates 1%" and is just stuck there...
When I try and run the source I get this error Code: [Select] Error: Could not find or load main class server Press any key to continue . . .
When I try and compile the source I get this Code: [Select] Compiling Torvapkz... The system cannot find the path specified. Complete Press any key to continue . . . any help for ANY of these problems is GREATLY appreciated. Thank you :D

item.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

No problem, pm me if you need something…although idk much about 637 =], but everything else

Read full topic

item.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:4, topic:439725”]Try updateing your jdk to the newest jdk and where it says “jdk1.6.0_21” put the new jdk in it.

Do the same thing for your compiler as well.[/quote]

Thanks alot!!!
Finally I can work on an awesome 634 :P.
Haha owe you one bud

Read full topic

item.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Try updateing your jdk to the newest jdk and where it says “jdk1.6.0_21” put the new jdk in it.

Do the same thing for your compiler as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

@echo off title Torvapkz 637 is Loading "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/java" -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause
thats the path its loading.
Yeah I’m not the greatest coder >.> I know a decent bit, but I know nothing about these errors, mainly because I’ve never had any trouble w/ these before
hehe

Read full topic

item.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

If you worked on 317 you should know this ^^

For the main class error get an IDE. Obviously stating it can’t find main class server…post your run and let me see it.

The compiler isn’t set to the correct path.

Also updating your jdk or jre to the latest update might fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile/ Run error (and client errror)
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Well I thought I’d try and upgrade to a 637 ( been working on a 317 ) so I downloaded a 637 (torvapkz) just to see how I’d like it…
and for starters, when I try and load the client it gets stuck on “Checking for updates 1%” and is just stuck there…

When I try and run the source I get this error
Code: [Select]
Error: Could not find or load main class server
Press any key to continue . . .

When I try and compile the source I get this
Code: [Select]
Compiling Torvapkz…
The system cannot find the path specified.
Complete
Press any key to continue . . .
any help for ANY of these problems is GREATLY appreciated. Thank you

Read full topic
